name: Jack's Grease Burger Destroyer
description:
Welcome to Grease Burger, Home of the Bunger Burger, May I take your Order...

----CONTROLS----

WASD - MOVE HAND

E - Pick Up  / Drop Item / Submit Plate (Only when your hand is hovered over the red tray!)

Q - Use item (Pick Up / Drop Off Burgers with the Spatula, Cut Tomatoes and Lettuce with the Knife, Clear the Plate if you Made a Mistake!)

NOTE: 

- GET YOUR INGREDIENTS FROM THE BOTTOM AND YOUR PLATE FROM THE LEFT, PREPARE YOUR INGREDIENTS, AND PLACE EM ON THE PLATE!

- YOU CAN ONLY PICK UP RAW BURGERS WITH YOUR HAND - THE REST NEED TO BE PICKED UP BY USING THE SPATULA!

- DON'T FORGET TO COOK YOUR BURGERS! THEY SHOULD BE DARK BUT NOT BURNED!

- YOU NEED TO CUT YOUR LETTUCE AND TOMATO BEFORE YOU PUT IT ON THE PLATE!

- IF YOU NEED TO DRIZZLE SAUCE, ALL YOU NEED TO DO IS HAVE THE STREAM COVER THE PLATE!

- PLACE THE PLATE ON THE RED TRAY AND THEN  PRESS E NEXT TO IT (STILL ON THE TRAY) TO SUBMIT THE BURGER!

- SUBMITTING THE BURGER WILL INCREASE YOUR SCORE AND GIVE YOU ANOTHER 60 SECONDS TO MAKE ANOTHER HAPPY CUSTOMER!

TRY TO MAKE A BURGER, ACCORDING TO THE CUSTOMER'S ORDER, EVERY 60 SECONDS... OR ELSE!!! 

WELCOME TO GREASE BURGER HOME OF THE BUNGER BURGER!!!

Made for MINI JAM 85

Developed By:

Jack

Jared

Tyler
